title: Brad's Clothing
description: Brad's Clothing is an e-commerce clothing store made with React that has user authentication/database support via firebase.

title: Advanced Notepad
description: This notepad is made with React and Typescript. It supports adding, editing, and deleting tags; saving notes in local storage; and filtering by notes and/or tags.

title: Monster Rolodex
description: Monster Rolodex is a fun app that fetches data via an API and filters cards by the text input field.

title: Speed Typing Game
description: This is another fun app that was created with React and styled to look like a retro game.

title: Galaxy Generator
description: Galaxy Generator was made with three.js and is one of the more visually stunning projects I've made.

title: Realistic Render
description: This rendering was created with three.js and used a model made by another party. The background images were taken by a professional photographer.

title: Scroll Based Animation
description: This mockup portfolio was made with three.js to demonstrate scroll based animation capabilities.

title: Calculator
description: This project was done very early on in my learning journey when learning the basics of Javascript

title: Etch-a-Sketch
description: The second project I ever did in Javascript was this Etch-a-sketch creation. It was small but very fun and fulfilling to make

title: Paper Rock Scissors Game
description: Paper, Rock, Scissors was the very first project I ever made in Javascript when learning the basics.

title: Responsive Site
description: This simple, but common, website is responsive and made with CSS grid. A hamburger menu is utilized for menu selection for the mobile view.

title: Dashboard
description: A dashboard is present in almost every business therefore this early project was to demonstrate CSS grid skills from The Odin Project.

title: Sign Up Form
description: This sign-up form was an early project that was part of The Odin Project course work.
